title: The Midterm Election’s Most Dominant Toxic Narratives
description: Misleading and divisive posts about the Nov. 8 midterm vote have flooded social media. Here are three prevalent themes.

title: Where Online Hate Speech Can Bring the Police to Your Door
description: Battling far-right extremism, Germany has gone further than any other Western democracy to prosecute individuals for what they say online, testing the limits of free speech on the internet.

title: Apple in Talks to Sponsor the Super Bowl Halftime Show
description: Apple’s pursuit of an N.F.L. media package has broadened to include a sponsorship of one of TV’s most-watched events.
